First, the wooden box is very nicely made.  It's cool by itself.  It's a nice little gift set.Is it real leather? I don't know.  The description doesn't use the word "genuine" which is usually the only confirmation, nor did it try to sneak (PU) into the description if it were synthetic.  So maybe it is real.  Either way, the bookmark looks nice and sturdy. What I didn't understand is why the leather tie that goes on the bookmark was folded underneath it in the box.  Or why the key chain was not fully assembled. Also, it comes with a little screwdriver, about the size used for eyeglasses or other small items.  The description doesn't mention this, so I guess it's like a little bonus? These are little things, but one thing I was a little disappointed by is the pen.  It's a fine pen as pens go, but the listing states a few times that it is a fountain pen.  It is not.  It's a ball point pen.
